mapper.select: /* sql : codeRepository.findByCodeGrpId */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CODE_ID, CODE_GRP_ID, CODE_NM, CODE_VAL, MEMO, ORD, CASE WHEN ORD = '' THEN '99999' ELSE ORD END AS ORDS, USE_YN, PRN_CODE_VAL, CREATED_AT, CREATED_ID, UPDATED_AT, UPDATED_ID FROM TB_CODE WHERE CODE_GRP_ID = #{code_grp_id} ) A ORDER BY CAST(ORDS AS INTEGER) asc, CODE_ID asc
mapper.insert: /* sql : codeRepository.save */ INSERT INTO TB_CODE ( CODE_ID, CODE_GRP_ID, CODE_NM, CODE_VAL, MEMO, ORD, PRN_CODE_VAL, CREATED_AT, CREATED_ID ) VALUES ( 'CD'||LPAD(nextval('SEQ_CD')||'', 8, '0'), #{code_grp_id}, #{code_nm}, #{code_val}, #{memo}, #{ord}, #{prn_code_val}, now(), #{created_id} )
